quotes.sentence: Be ______; everyone else is already taken.
A room without _____ is like a body without a soul.
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing ______.
Death twitches my ear. 'Live,' he says, 'I am ______.'
If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is _____, it will be enough.
Bitter are the roots of ___, but how sweet their fruit.
There are those who have knowledge and those who have understanding. The first requires memory and the second ______.
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the ______.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a ______.
The mind is everything. What you think you ______.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know ______.
When I let go of what I am, I become what I ______.
The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for a ______.
That which does not kill us makes us ______.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not ______.
That which does not kill us makes us ______.
Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say ______.
